@graph.name: Gobi Aloo - Dhania Waale(Cauliflower Potato tempered with Cilantro and spices) - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Gobi Aloo or Cauliflower Potato Stir fry is one of the staple dishes in most north Indian households.Delicious, easy and healthy. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.

itemListElement.name: Gobi Aloo – Dhania Waale(Cauliflower Potato tempered with Cilantro and spices)

@graph.name: Gobi Aloo - Dhania Waale (Cauliflower Potato Tempered With Cilantro And Spices)
@graph.description: Gobi Aloo or Cauliflower Potato Stir fry is one of the staple dishes in most north Indian households.Delicious, easy and healthy. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add oil and heat it at medium heat for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add oil and heat it at medium heat for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in cumin seeds and wait until they start sputtering.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in cumin seeds and wait until they start sputtering.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asafetida(hing), coriander seeds and turmeric and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asafetida(hing), coriander seeds and turmeric and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped ginger, garlic, Serrano chili and chopped cilantro and let them cook for 2-3 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped ginger, garlic, Serrano chili and chopped cilantro and let them cook for 2-3 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the potatoes chopped into small pieces and mix well and cook for 5 minutes stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the potatoes chopped into small pieces and mix well and cook for 5 minutes stirring occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Break the cauliflower into florets or chop some of the bigger florets to form smaller pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Break the cauliflower into florets or chop some of the bigger florets to form smaller pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cauliflower florets and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cauliflower florets and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce the heat to low and cook covered for 15-20 minutes stirring every 5-7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce the heat to low and cook covered for 15-20 minutes stirring every 5-7 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Check if potatoes are done and take off heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Check if potatoes are done and take off heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot with Rotis or Naan(Indian flat bread) and with some Daal(Lentil curry).
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot with Rotis or Naan(Indian flat bread) and with some Daal(Lentil curry).

@graph.keywords: caulifower stir fry, potato stir fry, traditional Indian meal
